sentences.en: Any soldier who leaves his post will be confined to barracks (= made to stay in the barracks ) .
sentences.cn: 任何擅离职守的士兵都要受到在营房里关禁闭的处罚。

sentences.en: Confine the use of insecticides to the evening and do not spray plants that are in flower.
sentences.cn: 只在晚间使用杀虫剂，而且不要对正在开花的植物喷药。

sentences.en: Confine your criticism to matters you understand.
sentences.cn: 发表评论时不要超出自己所了解的事情的范围.

sentences.en: Confine yourself to the facts.
sentences.cn: 你只说事实吧.

sentences.en: Doctors are trying to confine the disease within the city.
sentences.cn: 医生正试图将此病控制在城内.

sentences.en: Doctors confine themselves to prescribing rather than dispensing.
sentences.cn: 医生仅仅是开药而不配药。

sentences.en: Firefighters managed to confine the fire to the living room.
sentences.cn: 消防队员设法把火势控制在起居室内。

sentences.en: He did not confine himself to the one language.
sentences.cn: 他没把自己局限于这一门语言。

sentences.en: He thinks it cruel to confine a lark in a cage.
sentences.cn: 他认为把云雀关在笼子里太残忍了.

sentences.en: His contemporaries had begun to confine themselves to specialized investigations.
sentences.cn: 他同时代的人已开始局限于专门问题研究.

sentences.en: I can not afford to confine myself to one set of advisers.
sentences.cn: 我不能使自己拘限于只听到一批顾问的意见.

sentences.en: I shall confine myself to the subject of geography.
sentences.cn: 我将专攻地理学.

sentences.en: Is it cruel to confine a bird in a cage?
sentences.cn: 把鸟关在笼子里残忍不残忍?

sentences.en: It is sad to see a county confine its activities to undignified public bickering.
sentences.cn: 看到整个县都不顾颜面地公开争吵，真让人感到难过。

sentences.en: New England authors did not always confine themselves to their own rules.
sentences.cn: 新英兰的作家并非永远严守他们自己的戒条.

sentences.en: Such material can confine water in an artesian aquifer.
sentences.cn: 这样的介质能把水控制在承压含水层中.

sentences.en: Vaughan is confined to a wheelchair .
sentences.cn: 沃恩离不开轮椅。

sentences.en: We confine ourselves here to the case where surface tractions are prescribed.
sentences.cn: 在这里我们只研究面力为给定的情况.

sentences.en: We confined our study to ten cases.
sentences.cn: 我们把研究限定在十个案例以内。

sentences.en: within the confines of the prison
sentences.cn: 在监狱范围内

words.tran_cn: 狭窄的；幽禁的；有限制的；在分娩中的
受限的，限制的；狭窄的，偏狭的；拘束的
限制（confine的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to keep someone or something within the limits of a particular activity or subject

trans.tran_cn: 限制， 使局限； 使不外出， 禁闭
trans.tran_en: to keep someone in a place that they cannot leave, such as a prison
